practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak about something

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上开始考虑这件事
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about it this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我想和你说大约发生了什么
practice_phrases.target: I want to speak with you about what happened

practice_phrases.known: 我不确定我想对你说什么
practice_phrases.target: I am not sure about what I wanted to say to you

practice_phrases.known: 我想问你大约一些事但我还没准备好
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to ask you about something but I was not ready

practice_phrases.known: 我昨天开始仔细考虑如何说英语
practice_phrases.target: I started to think carefully about how to speak English yesterday

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想和你说大约你想对我说什么
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak with you about what you wanted to say to me this morning
